mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts( address, appellation, birth, contactSummary, createBy, createTime, customerId, description, email, fullname, id, job, mphone, nextContactTime, owner, source ) values( #{address}, #{appellation}, #{birth}, #{contactSummary}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{customerId}, #{description}, #{email}, #{fullname}, #{id}, #{job}, #{mphone}, #{nextContactTime}, #{owner}, #{source} )
